plays.text: Goal scored by Jeremy Roenick assisted by Simon Gagne and Justin Williams
Penalty to Jassen Cullimore 2 minutes for Delay of Game(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Nolan Pratt 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ruslan Fedotenko
Penalty to Keith Primeau 2 minutes for Holding Tim Taylor
Penalty to Matthew Barnaby 2 minutes for Interference Ruslan Fedotenko
Goal scored by Eric Desjardins assisted by Chris Therien and Marty Murray
Penalty to CORY SARICH 2 minutes for Tripping Justin Williams
Penalty to Marty Murray 2 minutes for Slashing Pavel Kubina
Penalty to Eric Weinrich 2 minutes for Hooking Brad Richards
Penalty to Dave Andreychuk 2 minutes for Tripping Eric Weinrich
Penalty to Jeremy Roenick 2 minutes for Interference Ben Clymer
